We are women shaping the stories of women. We champion and celebrate the achievements and breakthroughs of women trailblazers shaping the future of AI

We talk about Data Science, Machine Learning and AI and their applications in different sectors; medicine, climate, agriculture, robotics and a whole lot more!

About WiML T端bingen

WiML T端bingen is a group of women pushing the boundries of societal stereotypes and working to advance the inclusion of women in AI.

We are fueled by a passion to cause positive impact in the society through machine learning.

We specialize in natural language processing, and computer vision, aiming to solve complex problems and drive progress.

Education and community engagement are central to our mission, as we strive to empower the next generation of AI experts through workshops and mentorship.
